1513500.name: Plumber
1513500.description:
With the rise of VR technology is incredible and amazing to see how VR revolutionize old-school games
Plumber is VR game that is inspired from the old pipe puzzles.
With the use of 6DOF controllers you can use your both hands to pick up pipes and to place them in correct order so you can accomplish the given task.
The player is completely immersive to the environment and uses all senses in the game.

Spoiler alert. The levels are quite challenging. There are dark rooms where you must use flashlight, valves are under pressure so you need to act fast, and more features to discover.
1513500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
